summary: A wheelchair-accessible subway journey from Times Square to Queens, including a museum visit and a vegetarian Chinese lunch, all within the specified time frame.
assumptions: The subway system operates normally with no unexpected delays.
MoMA PS1 has wheelchair access and facilities as expected.
Legend of Taste restaurant has adequate vegetarian options and wheelchair access.
Walking paths between subway stations, museum, and restaurant are reasonably accessible.

legs.toLocation: Court Square Subway Station, Long Island City, Queens, NY
legs.accessibilityNotes: The 7 train line from Times Square-42nd Street to Court Square is wheelchair accessible with elevators at both stations.
legs.choiceReasoning: Selected the subway as per user preference and prioritized an accessible route to Queens. Cost for one subway ride is $2.90.
